content.question: Babbage’s description of how “every convenience” and “every luxury” came to be developed best illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: The private initiative of industrialists and manufacturers that developed Britain’s industrial economy
The increasing availability of overseas goods as a result of the expansion of the British Empire
The growth of British industrial cities over the course of the nineteenth century
The failure of British industry to keep pace with Germany during the second industrial revolution

content.answer: The private initiative of industrialists and manufacturers that developed Britain’s industrial economy

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
